title: Urgoat Skin
body:
So I was thinking, can somebody please make me an urgot skin, but it's Urgoat?? 

I reckon it would be hilarious and fun to make. 


Thanks!!! 
PeopleTrust

replies.body:
Urgot isn't likely to get any new skins until after his rework.

According to several Rioters Urgot's in the works for a Sion level rework.
